text: The Suspended Step of the Stork (, translit. To Meteoro Vima Tou Pelargou) is a 1991 Greek romantic drama movie directed by Theo Angelopoulos and starring Ilias Logothetis, Marcello Mastroianni, Jeanne Moreau, Dimitris Poulikakos, Gerasimos Skiadaressis, Christoforos Nezer. ==Other websites== * Category:1991 romantic drama movies Category:Greek movies Category:Movies directed by Theo Angelopoulos
title: The Suspended Step of the Stork
